name: fixture-interface
description: A simple interface to make helpers for setting up and tearing down data needed for tests.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types
scripts.test: npm run build && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=lcov --report-dir=test/reports mocha test/*.spec.js
scripts.example: npm run build && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text --reporter=lcov --report-dir=example/test/reports mocha example/test/*.spec.js

author: @beardyman
